snippet: After neighbors started to gather around the house, a nearby car bomb exploded, killing eight people and wounding 30.
abstract: Gunmen storm home of policeman in Iraq, killing 13 people, including officer and his entire family; nearby car bomb explodes killing eight bystanders.
lead_paragraph: After neighbors started to gather around the house, a nearby car bomb exploded, killing eight people and wounding 30.

headline.main: Iraq: Attack on Officer’s Home Kills 13
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Attack on Officer’s Home Kills 13
